bug.short_desc: Chrome Fails to Load Source Classes from Filesystem

long_desc.thetext:
The source version of Playground fails to load certain classes in Chrome. This apparently only happens when loading the source version from the file system (e.g. build version from file system is fine, source version via HTTP is fine).
The affected GUI samples are: - Dialog - Table - Tree - YQL Binding
Running these samples results in errors in the Playground "Log" pane. Two of them (Dialog and Tree) complain concrete classes, tabview.Tabview and tree.Tree, respectively. In fact, both namespaces are missing (qx.ui.tabview and qx.ui.tree), checking the interactive console.
The corresponding <script> nodes are in the DOM, in their correct places (load order), the browser can load the files when opening the "src" link in a new tab. But the "Scripts" tab doesn't list them. The Chrome console shows no error message regarding these files.
Move open issues to RESOLVED â€“ LATER, whose last comment is older than a year.
